br.com.oaks.ICPBravo.certs.crl
Class ICPBravoCRLGenerator

java.lang.Object
  br.com.oaks.ICPBravo.certs.crl.ICPBravoCRLGenerator

public class ICPBravoCRLGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Classe que permite a geração de um CRL (Certificate Revogation List - X509v2).

See Also:
Exemplos.testaCertificadoX509v2()
